meanings.definition: Attractively tall and dignified in appearance.
meanings.sent1: The statuesque model walked gracefully down the runway.
meanings.sent2: She admired the statuesque figure of the elegant statue in the park.
meanings.sent3: The statuesque giraffe tried to blend in with the trees by standing very still.
meanings.sent4: Her statuesque presence commanded attention in the crowded room.
meanings.sent5: The statuesque mountain peak towered over the landscape, majestic and grand.

meanings.definition: Resembling a statue in form or beauty.
meanings.sent1: The statuesque fountain in the garden was a beautiful centerpiece.
meanings.sent2: The dancer's statuesque pose at the end of the performance captivated the audience.
meanings.sent3: The statuesque ice sculpture began to melt under the hot sun, creating a unique art piece.
meanings.sent4: Her statuesque profile in the photograph looked like a work of art.
meanings.sent5: The statuesque marble statue in the museum seemed almost lifelike in its perfection.
